section.name: Join In
section.p: You're interested in participating? No problem, here are some open tasks to be finished. If you want to participate but don't know exactly where to start, don't hesitate to contact me.

ul.li: I'd like to have a concept (including a protoype implementation) for a DMRL client which does not need to have Java-Scipt enabled on the browser.
Just in case someone wants to join in the development or check out and compile the source code, a developer documentation is also needed.
Translation of the user documentation to (at least) german language.
Clean up the maven pom files and maven project.
Server should periodically check if a new ranking list is available.
There is a problem with the deployment of the taglib to the application server which needs to be solved.
Implement a basic mechanism for service versioning.
Solve the XML validation problem with samples.xml:head
License verification has to be done.
Implement some additional services i.e. get players by category.
Do some search engine optimization and make the project homepage available to Google.
Design a logo for the project.

Do some merchanidsing and create some advertised products including
T-Shirt,
Coffee mug,
Minigolf case and
Minigolf ball.
